title: Your First Acupuncture Visit: A Step-by-Step Guide
excerpt: A friendly walkthrough of what happens during your first appointment, from intake to treatment.
author: Dr. Michael Huang
contentMarkdown:
Your first visit is focused on understanding your full health picture. Here is what you can expect.

## Before You Arrive

- Eat a light meal
- Wear comfortable clothing
- Bring a list of medications and supplements

## During the Visit

We begin with a detailed consultation and then proceed to a gentle treatment session. Most patients feel relaxed and calm during treatment.

## Aftercare

You may feel deeply relaxed or lightly energized. Drink water, rest if needed, and note any changes in sleep, pain, or digestion.
